title: A mind-reading combat jet for the future
description: The Tempest fighter jet will have artificial intelligence tech to monitor and help the pilot.

title: Convenience store spy cameras face legal challenge
description: Big Brother Watch campaigners says the "Orwellian" cameras at Southern Co-op shops breach people's rights.

title: Google rules blocked children's diabetes app
description: An NHS-recommended app says Google will not permit it to send text message alerts about glucose levels.
